content: Hey you guys...... this airport no doubt is the largest employer in that county.... and one of the most desireable jobs to have... 8 to 6, full benefits, resonable retirement plan... all ya got to do is show up, punch the clock, find your cot and take a nap. And for those who cannot sleep we have the lunch room where a never-ending game of cards is played... oops, a plane commeth.... OK, back to the cots and card game...... yepper, ol'Murthless is well loved. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: This is as bad as the bridge to nowhere. It is easy for people that don't live in the state to point fingers, but Sheridan actually brought up a good point...the people that work there are gonna vote for the guy that gives them a job. Hey, maybe the attention will get the airport more traffic...or more attention. That's what stopped that ridiculous Alaska bridge.

title: So, Tell me More about the MURTHA AIRPORT

content: 200mil for an airport that can handle only 87K D/W on either runway and they still have VASIs on two of the runways? WTF????? Oh, lets not forget that one set of runways is a non-precision. For that amount of money, they should have a hell of a lot more than what they do.
